mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dog ( dogName, kind, weight, birth, gender, neutering, experience, bite, memo, dogImg, size, skin, heart, marking, mounting, uNo ) SELECT #{dogName}, #{kind}, #{weight}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{neutering}, #{experience}, #{bite}, #{memo}, #{dogImg}, #{size}, #{skin}, #{heart}, #{marking}, #{mounting}, #{uNo} FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dog WHERE uNo = #{uNo});
